summary: Because boobs are pretty. This is a small edit to the Spriggan normal maps to add the suggestion of possibly functional mammaries.
descriptionHtml:
Hello, more anatomy from the Jabberwocky.

This is a simple texture change to the spriggan normals to make the breasts a little smoother and fuller, and add those all-important nipples. Yes, they are made of wood, but that doesn't mean you couldn't suck on them a little and maybe and get some sap out, I don't know. That's a job for someone more talented than I.

It's pretty straight-forward; download, activate. But for those of you who like to do things by hand, just put the /spriggan folder in the /Data/Textures/actors file path.

Enjoy!
author: Jabberwocky07
